page.title: 05Entertainment
page.content:
Entertainment
Park Hall Ballroom is the local centre for entertainment. They promote the following functions fairly regularly - roller skating, disco dances, darts nd pool competitions, wrestling, country and western evenings. They have a restaurant and cater for wedding parties and banquets. They have a lot of part-time staff but mpst of these come from Hereford. B.M.X. Parents and children from the Tump Lane area, after gaining permission from the local council, have built a bicycle motor cross circuit at the rear of the council houses.
